trans-unit.source: Instructs Solr what kinds of Request parameters should be included in the response for debugging purposes, legal values include:
trans-unit.target: 指示Solr在响应中应该包含哪些类型的Request参数,以便于调试,法定值包括。

trans-unit.source: Integer Unix timestamp of last commit date. (Unaffected by update.)
Integer Unix timestamp of last up-to-date time for properties
Integer Unix timestamp of last up-to-date time for text
Integer revision number of item to retrieve, default is the HEAD revision.
Integer revision number of repository to check out. Default is HEAD, the most recent revision.
Integer revision number to retrieve listing of. When omitted, the HEAD revision is used.
Integer revision of item in working copy.
Integer revision of last commit. (Unaffected by update.)

trans-unit.target: 用于定制序列化的接口。

trans-unit.source: Interface for external iterators or objects that can be iterated themselves internally.
trans-unit.target: 外部迭代器或对象的接口,可以在内部自行迭代。

trans-unit.source: Interface to create an external Iterator.
trans-unit.target: 用于创建外部迭代器的接口。

trans-unit.source: Interface to detect if a class is traversable using foreach.
trans-unit.target: 用于使用foreach检测类是否可遍历的接口。

trans-unit.source: Interface to provide accessing objects as arrays.
trans-unit.target: 提供以数组形式访问对象的接口。

trans-unit.source: Interfaces are defined in the same way as a class, but with the interface keyword replacing the class keyword and without any of the methods having their contents defined.
Interfaces are defined in the same way as a class, but with the interface keyword replacing the class keyword and without any of the methods having their contents defined.
trans-unit.target: 接口的定义方式与类相同，但是用interface关键字替换了class关键字，并且没有定义任何方法的内容。

trans-unit.source: Interfaces can be extended like classes using the extends operator.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用extends运算符像类一样扩展接口。

trans-unit.source: Internal (built-in) classes that implement this interface can be used in a foreach construct and do not need to implement IteratorAggregate or Iterator.
trans-unit.target: 实现此接口的内部（内置）类可以在foreach构造中使用，而无需实现IteratorAggregate或Iterator。

trans-unit.source: Internal PHP functions mainly use Error reporting, only modern Object oriented extensions use exceptions. However, errors can be simply translated to exceptions with ErrorException.
trans-unit.target: 内部PHP函数主要使用错误报告，仅现代的面向对象的扩展使用异常。但是，可以使用ErrorException将错误简单地转换为异常。

trans-unit.source: Internal PHP functions mainly use Error reporting, only modern Object oriented extensions use exceptions. However, errors can be easily translated to exceptions with ErrorException. This technique only works with non-fatal errors, however.

Internally, PHP strings are byte arrays. As a result, accessing or modifying a string using array brackets is not multi-byte safe, and should only be done with strings that are in a single-byte encoding such as ISO-8859-1.
trans-unit.target: 在内部,PHP的字符串是字节数组。因此,使用数组括号访问或修改字符串是不安全的,只能使用单字节编码的字符串,如ISO-8859-1。

trans-unit.source: Internally, sequential integer keys will be paired with the yielded values, just as with a non-associative array.
trans-unit.target: 在内部,顺序整数键将与产生的值配对,就像非关联数组一样。

trans-unit.source: Internally, this function calls the strptime() function provided by the system's C library. This function can exhibit noticeably different behaviour across different operating systems. The use of date_parse_from_format(), which does not suffer from these issues, is recommended on PHP 5.3.0 and later.

Internally, this function calls the strptime() function provided by the system's C library. This function can exhibit noticeably different behaviour across different operating systems. The use of date_parse_from_format(), which does not suffer from these issues, is recommended on PHP 5.3.0 and later.
trans-unit.target: 在内部，此函数调用系统C库提供的strptime（）函数。在不同的操作系统上，此功能可能表现出明显不同的行为。在PHP 5.3.0及更高版本中，建议使用不受这些问题困扰的date_parse_from_format（）。

trans-unit.source: Interprets the binary value of the first byte of character as an unsigned integer between 0 and 255.
Interprets the binary value of the first byte of string as an unsigned integer between 0 and 255.
trans-unit.target: 将 string 的第一个字节的二进制值解释为0到255之间的无符号整数。

Introduced request_order. This directive affects the contents of $_REQUEST.

trans-unit.source: Introduces a bias for non-straight seams. This parameter is typically 0.
trans-unit.target: 引入非直缝的偏置。该参数通常为0。

trans-unit.source: Invalid key and iv sizes are no longer accepted. mcrypt_decrypt() will now throw a warning and return FALSE if the inputs are invalid. Previously keys and IVs were padded with '\0' bytes to the next valid size.
trans-unit.target: 无效的 key 和 iv 大小不再被接受。现在，mcrypt_decrypt（）将引发警告，如果输入无效，则返回 FALSE 。以前，键和IV用' \ 0 '字节填充到下一个有效大小。

trans-unit.source: Invalid key and iv sizes are no longer accepted. mcrypt_decrypt() will now throw a warning and return false if the inputs are invalid. Previously keys and IVs were padded with '\0' bytes to the next valid size.

Invalid key and iv sizes are no longer accepted. mcrypt_encrypt() will now throw a warning and return FALSE if the inputs are invalid. Previously keys and IVs were padded with '\0' bytes to the next valid size.
trans-unit.target: 无效的 key 和 iv 大小不再被接受。mcrypt_encrypt（）现在将发出警告，如果输入无效，则返回 FALSE 。以前，键和IV用' \ 0 '字节填充到下一个有效大小。

trans-unit.source: Invalid key and iv sizes are no longer accepted. mcrypt_encrypt() will now throw a warning and return false if the inputs are invalid. Previously keys and IVs were padded with '\0' bytes to the next valid size.
Invalid arguments detected on the PHP side (before invoking functions of the ICU library) are not recorded for the purposes of this function.
trans-unit.target: 在PHP端检测到的无效参数(在调用ICU库的函数之前)在本函数中不会被记录。

trans-unit.source: Invalid non-lowercased variants of the true, false and null literals are no longer accepted as valid input, and will generate warnings.
trans-unit.target: true，false和null文字的无效非小写变体将不再被视为有效输入，并且将生成警告。

trans-unit.source: Invalid or failing queries will return FALSE.
trans-unit.target: 无效或失败的查询将返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: Invalid or failing queries will return false.
Invalid timezone identifiers (including empty strings) are no longer allowed for timezone.
trans-unit.target: 无效的时区标识符（包括空字符串）不再适用于 timezone 。

trans-unit.source: Invoke all pending watchers while resetting their pending state.
trans-unit.target: 调用所有挂起的观察者,同时重置他们的挂起状态。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the function and pass its arguments as array.
trans-unit.target: 调用函数并将其参数作为数组传递。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the reflected method and pass its arguments as array.
trans-unit.target: 调用反射的方法,并将其参数作为数组传递。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the watcher callback with the given received events bit mask.
trans-unit.target: 用给定的接收事件位掩码调用监视者回调。

trans-unit.source: Is 1 if the interval represents a negative time period and 0 otherwise. See DateInterval::format().
Is 1 if the interval represents a negative time period and 0 otherwise. See DateInterval::format().
trans-unit.target: 是1，如果间隔代表负的时间段和0否则。参见DateInterval :: format（）。

trans-unit.source: Is a BCP 47 compliant language tag.
Is a comma separated list of sections that need to be present in file to produce a result array. If none of the requested sections could be found the return value is FALSE.
trans-unit.target: 是用逗号分隔的节列表，需要在文件中显示这些节才能生成结果数组。如果找不到任何请求的节，则返回值为 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: Is a comma separated list of sections that need to be present in file to produce a result array. If none of the requested sections could be found the return value is false.
Is a connection id or result id on which to change the settings. For SQLSetConnectOption(), this is a connection id. For SQLSetStmtOption(), this is a result id.
trans-unit.target: 是一个连接id或结果id,可以在其上更改设置。对于SQLSetConnectOption()来说,这是一个连接id.对于SQLSetStmtOption()来说,这是一个结果id。对于SQLSetStmtOption(),这是一个连接id。

trans-unit.source: Is a convenience method that scales an image proportionally to one-half its original size
trans-unit.target: 是一种方便的方法,将图像按比例放大到原尺寸的一半。

trans-unit.source: Is a convenience method that scales an image proportionally to twice its original size.
trans-unit.target: 是一种方便的方法,将图像按比例放大到原始尺寸的两倍。

trans-unit.source: Is called after calling RecursiveIteratorIterator::getChildren(), and its associated RecursiveIteratorIterator::rewind().
trans-unit.target: 在调用RecursiveIteratorIterator :: getChildren（）及其关联的RecursiveIteratorIterator :: rewind（）之后被调用。

trans-unit.source: Is like Imagick::ThresholdImage() but force all pixels above the threshold into white while leaving all pixels below the threshold unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 就像Imagick::ThresholdImage()一样,但会强制所有高于阈值的像素变成白色,而让所有低于阈值的像素保持不变。

trans-unit.source: Is like Imagick::thresholdImage() but forces all pixels below the threshold into black while leaving all pixels above the threshold unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 类似于Imagick::thresholdImage(),但会强制所有低于阈值的像素变成黑色,而让所有高于阈值的像素保持不变。

trans-unit.source: Is specified by character code names before conversion. It is either an array, or a comma separated enumerated list. If from_encoding is not specified, the internal encoding will be used.
trans-unit.target: 由转换前的字符代码名称指定。它可以是array或逗号分隔的枚举列表。如果未指定 from_encoding ，则将使用内部编码。

trans-unit.source: Is specified by character code names before conversion. It is either an array, or a comma separated enumerated list. If from_encoding is not specified, the internal encoding will be used.
Is the ODBC function to use. The value should be 1 for SQLSetConnectOption() and 2 for SQLSetStmtOption().
trans-unit.target: 是要使用的ODBC函数。SQLSetConnectOption()的值应该是1,SQLSetStmtOption()的值应该是2。

trans-unit.source: Issue a call to remote RPC method.
trans-unit.target: 发出对远程RPC方法的调用。

trans-unit.source: Issues E_WARNING if libxml was built without schema support, the schema contains errors or if XMLReader::read() has already been called.
trans-unit.target: 问题 E_WARNING 如果libxml的是没有架构支持内置，该架构包含错误或如果的XMLReader ::阅读（）已经被调用。

trans-unit.source: Issues E_WARNING with type unsupported by XMLRPC.
Issues an E_WARNING and returns FALSE if seed is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 发出 E_WARNING ，如果 seed 无效，则返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: Issues an E_WARNING and returns false if seed is not valid.

It also indicates if a cryptographically strong algorithm was used to produce the pseudo-random bytes, and does this via the optional crypto_strong parameter. It's rare for this to be FALSE, but some systems may be broken or old.
trans-unit.target: 它还指示是否使用了加密功能强的算法来生成伪随机字节，并通过可选的 crypto_strong 参数来执行此操作。这很少是 FALSE ，但是某些系统可能损坏或旧了。

trans-unit.source: It also indicates if a cryptographically strong algorithm was used to produce the pseudo-random bytes, and does this via the optional crypto_strong parameter. It's rare for this to be false, but some systems may be broken or old.
It became possible to change the modification time of a directory under Windows.
trans-unit.target: 在Windows下,改变目录的修改时间成为可能。

trans-unit.source: It became possible to pass an IntlCalendar object.
It can be used multiple times with different field names to indicate multiple facet fields
trans-unit.target: 它可以多次使用不同的字段名来表示多个面的字段。

trans-unit.source: It does not indicate if the file exists or not on disk, only where the library is looking for the database.
trans-unit.target: 它并不表明文件在磁盘上是否存在,只表明库在哪里寻找数据库。

trans-unit.source: It does not indicate if the file is a proper database, only if it is readable.
trans-unit.target: 它并不表明该文件是否是一个正确的数据库,只表明它是否可读。

trans-unit.source: It effects that the field values can be accessed with the respective column names used as keys to the returned object's data property. Associated results are actually references to the numerically indexed data, so modifying data[0][0] causes that data[0]['field_name_for_first_column'] is modified as well.

It is r for read access, w for read/write access to an already existing database, c for read/write access and database creation if it doesn't currently exist, and n for create, truncate and read/write access.

It is r for read access, w for read/write access to an already existing database, c for read/write access and database creation if it doesn't currently exist, and n for create, truncate and read/write access. The database is created in BTree mode, other modes (like Hash or Queue) are not supported.

It is always set, that is, the returned object has a data property which is a 2 dimensional array indexed numerically. For example, in the expression data[2][3]2 stands for the row (or record) number and 3 stands for the column (or field) number. The first row and column are indexed at 0. If DBX_RESULT_ASSOC is also specified, the returning object contains the information related to DBX_RESULT_INFO too, even if it was not specified.

It is r for read access, w for read/write access to an already existing database, c for read/write access and database creation if it doesn't currently exist, and n for create, truncate and read/write access.
trans-unit.target: 它是r代表读访问，w代表对已经存在的数据库的读/写访问，c代表读/写访问和数据库创建（如果当前尚不存在），n代表创建，截断和读/写访问。

trans-unit.source: It is r for read access, w for read/write access to an already existing database, c for read/write access and database creation if it doesn't currently exist, and n for create, truncate and read/write access. The database is created in BTree mode, other modes (like Hash or Queue) are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 它是r代表读访问，w代表对已经存在的数据库的读/写访问，c代表读/写访问和数据库创建（如果当前尚不存在），n代表创建，截断和读/写访问。数据库是在BTree模式下创建的，不支持其他模式（例如Hash或Queue）。

trans-unit.source: It is NOT recommended for you to store a copy of the values in the context and then process them at the end, as you would cause SQLite to use a lot of memory to process the query - just think of how much memory you would need if a million rows were stored in memory, each containing a string 32 bytes in length.
It is a Unicode Separator character (categories "Z" = "Zs" or "Zl" or "Zp"), but is not also a non-breaking space (U+00A0 NBSP or U+2007 Figure Space or U+202F Narrow NBSP).
trans-unit.target: 它是Unicode分隔符(类别 "Z"="Zs "或 "Zl "或 "Zp"),但也不是非分隔符(U+00A0 NBSP或U+2007 Figure Space或U+202F Narrow NBSP)。

trans-unit.source: It is a valid handle for the connected database, and as such it can be used in module specific functions (if required).
It is a valid handle for the connected database, and as such it can be used in module-specific functions (if required).

trans-unit.target: 也可以使用这种语法在字符串中使用变量来访问类属性。

trans-unit.source: It is important to remember that the standard PHP error handler is completely bypassed for the error types specified by error_types unless the callback function returns FALSE. error_reporting() settings will have no effect and your error handler will be called regardless - however you are still able to read the current value of error_reporting and act appropriately. Of particular note is that this value will be 0 if the statement that caused the error was prepended by the @ error-control operator.
trans-unit.target: 重要的是要记住，对于由 error_types 指定的错误类型，将完全绕过标准的PHP错误处理程序，除非回调函数返回 FALSE 。error_reporting（）设置将无效，并且无论如何都会调用您的错误处理程序-但是，您仍然可以读取error_reporting的当前值并采取适当的措施。特别要注意的是，如果导致错误的语句由@ error-control运算符添加，则该值为0 。

trans-unit.source: It is important to remember that the standard PHP error handler is completely bypassed for the error types specified by error_types unless the callback function returns false. error_reporting() settings will have no effect and your error handler will be called regardless - however you are still able to read the current value of error_reporting and act appropriately. Of particular note is that this value will be 0 if the statement that caused the error was prepended by the @ error-control operator.

It is important to understand how the switch statement is executed in order to avoid mistakes. The switch statement executes line by line (actually, statement by statement). In the beginning, no code is executed. Only when a case statement is found whose expression evaluates to a value that matches the value of the switch expression does PHP begin to execute the statements. PHP continues to execute the statements until the end of the switch block, or the first time it sees a break statement. If you don't write a break statement at the end of a case's statement list, PHP will go on executing the statements of the following case. For example:

trans-unit.source: It is not allowed to call EvLoop::run() or similar methods or functions that enter the current event loop from either EvPrepare or EvCheck watchers. Other loops than the current one are fine, however. The rationale behind this is that one don't need to check for recursion in those watchers, i.e. the sequence will always be: EvPrepare -> blocking -> EvCheck , so having a watcher of each kind they will always be called in pairs bracketing the blocking call.
trans-unit.target: 不允许从EvPrepare或EvCheck观察者调用EvLoop :: run（）或类似方法或函数来进入当前事件循环。但是，除当前循环外，其他循环也可以。这样做的基本原理是，无需在那些观察程序中检查递归，即序列始终为：EvPrepare- > blocking-> EvCheck，因此拥有各种类型的观察程序时，它们总是成对地放在方括号内阻止通话。

trans-unit.source: It is not possible to have the literal character "]" as the end character of a range. A pattern such as [W-]46] is interpreted as a class of two characters ("W" and "-") followed by a literal string "46]", so it would match "W46]" or "-46]". However, if the "]" is escaped with a backslash it is interpreted as the end of range, so [W-\]46] is interpreted as a single class containing a range followed by two separate characters. The octal or hexadecimal representation of "]" can also be used to end a range.
trans-unit.target: 不可能将文字字符"]"作为一个范围的结束字符。像[W-]46]这样的模式被解释为两个字符("W "和"-")的类别,后面是一个字面字符串 "46]",所以它将匹配 "W46]"或"-46]"。然而,如果用反斜杠转义"]",则会被解释为范围的结束,所以[W-/\]46]被解释为包含一个范围的单一类,后面是两个独立的字符。八进制或十六进制表示的"]"也可以用来结束一个范围。

It is valid to install a child watcher after an EvChild has exited but before the event loop has started its next iteration. For example, first one calls fork , then the new child process might exit, and only then an EvChild watcher is installed in the parent for the new PID .

It is valid to install a child watcher after an EvChild has exited but before the event loop has started its next iteration. For example, first one calls fork , then the new child process might exit, and only then an EvChild watcher is installed in the parent for the new PID .
trans-unit.target: 在退出EvChild之后但在事件循环开始其下一次迭代之前，安装儿童观察程序是有效的。例如，第一个调用fork，然后新的子进程可能会退出，然后只有在EvChild监视程序中为新PID的父级中安装了EvChild监视程序。

trans-unit.source: It is very important to note that the line with the closing identifier must contain no other characters, except a semicolon (;). That means especially that the identifier may not be indented, and there may not be any spaces or tabs before or after the semicolon. It's also important to realize that the first character before the closing identifier must be a newline as defined by the local operating system. This is \n on UNIX systems, including macOS. The closing delimiter must also be followed by a newline.

It is very important to note that the line with the closing identifier must contain no other characters, except a semicolon (;). That means especially that the identifier may not be indented, and there may not be any spaces or tabs before or after the semicolon. It's also important to realize that the first character before the closing identifier must be a newline as defined by the local operating system. This is \n on UNIX systems, including macOS. The closing delimiter must also be followed by a newline.
trans-unit.target: 非常重要的一点是，带有结束标识符的行除分号（;）之外，不得包含其他任何字符。特别是这意味着标识符不能缩进，分号之前或之后可能没有空格或制表符。同样重要的是要认识到，结束标识符之前的第一个字符必须是本地操作系统定义的换行符。在UNIX系统（包括macOS）上，这是\ n。结束定界符也必须跟换行符。

trans-unit.source: It is very important to realize that because the backslash is used as an escape character within strings, it should always be doubled when used inside a string. Otherwise there is a risk of unintended consequences:

trans-unit.source: It is worth noting that before PHP 5.2.0 the __toString() method was only called when it was directly combined with echo or print. Since PHP 5.2.0, it is called in any string context (e.g. in printf() with %s modifier) but not in other types contexts (e.g. with %d modifier). Since PHP 5.2.0, converting objects without __toString() method to string would cause E_RECOVERABLE_ERROR.

It is worth noting that before PHP 5.2.0 the __toString() method was only called when it was directly combined with echo or print. Since PHP 5.2.0, it is called in any string context (e.g. in printf() with %s modifier) but not in other types contexts (e.g. with %d modifier). Since PHP 5.2.0, converting objects without __toString() method to string would cause E_RECOVERABLE_ERROR.
trans-unit.target: 值得注意的是，在PHP 5.2.0之前，仅将__toString（）方法与echo或print直接结合使用时才调用它。从PHP 5.2.0开始，可以在任何字符串上下文中（例如，在使用％s修饰符的printf（）中）调用它，而在其他类型的上下文（例如，使用％d修饰符）中则不能调用它。从PHP 5.2.0开始，将不具有__toString（）方法的对象转换为字符串会导致 E_RECOVERABLE_ERROR 。

trans-unit.source: It is worth noting that the mail() function is not suitable for larger volumes of email in a loop. This function opens and closes an SMTP socket for each email, which is not very efficient.

It sets up the subpattern as a capturing subpattern (as defined above). When the whole pattern matches, that portion of the subject string that matched the subpattern is passed back to the caller via the ovector argument of pcre_exec(). Opening parentheses are counted from left to right (starting from 1) to obtain the numbers of the capturing subpatterns.
trans-unit.target: 它将子模式设置为捕获子模式（如上定义）。当整个模式匹配时，与子模式匹配的主题字符串部分将通过pcre_exec（）的ovector参数传递回调用方。从左到右（从1开始）对开括号进行计数，以获取捕获子图案的数量。

trans-unit.source: Iterable can be used as a parameter type to indicate that a function requires a set of values, but does not care about the form of the value set since it will be used with foreach. If a value is not an array or instance of Traversable, a TypeError will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Iterable可用作参数类型，以指示函数需要一组值，但是并不关心值集的形式，因为它将与foreach一起使用。如果值不是一个数组或实例Traversable的，一个类型错误将被抛出。

trans-unit.source: Iterable is a pseudo-type introduced in PHP 7.1. It accepts any array or object implementing the Traversable interface. Both of these types are iterable using foreach and can be used with yield from within a generator.
trans-unit.target: Iterable是PHP 7.1中引入的伪类型。它接受实现Traversable接口的任何数组或对象。这两种类型都可以使用foreach进行迭代，并且可以在生成器中以产量使用。
